description: Incip.: ... الحمد لله البر الجواد ... اما بعد فان الاشتغال بالعلم vol. 1 (through kitāb ṣalāt al-khawf). ff. 257. 272 x 190; 195 x 135 mm. 25 lin. Rabīʻ II, 740. Commentary on Muslimʼs collection: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 167 (commentary 2); S I, 265 (commentary 5).
author: Nawawī, 1233-1277
title: Minhāj al-muḥaddithīn.
creator: Nawawī, 1233-1277
subject: Muslim ibn al-ḥajjāj al-Qushayrī, ca. 821-875—Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
